# Data Source (rootly_custom_field_option)

DEPRECATED: Please use `form_field` and `form_field_option` data sources instead.

## Example Usage

```shell
data "rootly_custom_field_option" "my-custom-field-option" {
  slug = "my-custom-field-option"
}
```
